channel.title: I Bot v2 by IMPSoft . net Released! [The ONLY WORKING RS2 Bot]
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://www.impsoft.net/ibotstats/ibot.JPG[/img]
[img]http://www.impsoft.net/tp/Themes/blackandblue/images/8_dragpick.PNG[/img][b]IMPSoft.net is now back online thanks to Krrose27! THANKS![/b][img]http://www.impsoft.net/tp/Themes/blackandblue/images/8_dragpick.PNG[/img]
[u][b]I Bot v2![/b][/u]
[img]http://www.impsoft.net/tp/Themes/blackandblue/images/7_runepick.PNG[/img][b]Credits![/b][img]http://www.impsoft.net/tp/Themes/blackandblue/images/7_runepick.PNG[/img] ruler entire bot, 10,000++ lines of code, not to mention ideas and solutions GenoDemoN testing, ideas, some procedures, energy drinks regex for applet stub benland for splines exemplar for serverlist capndrunk - unique game screen ocr bitmasks/bitmaps. sean for class loader pd for always being their for me
[img]http://www.impsoft.net/tp/Themes/blackandblue/images/6_adampick.PNG[/img][b]I Bot Information[/b][img]http://www.impsoft.net/tp/Themes/blackandblue/images/6_adampick.PNG[/img] [i]I Bot can trick clients into thinking they have "focus", ect. It can also block events. This allows multiple applets to run on the same OS and be tricked into thinking they have focus and they are recieving mouse events. To the RS server is just looks like you and your brother are playing under a router![/i] -Ruler
[b]Color Recogntion[/b] Everything scar can do & ALOT more Advance methods that can return arrays of all color matches Direct access to the pixel arrays RGB independ tolerances COMPLETE OCR Endlessly Extendable
[b]Java Threads[/b] Bot GUI Mouse Controller Random thread Script thread
[b]Advantages of I Bot[/b] WAAAY faster than scar Very Long Lasting low up keep less dectable Very powerful and well thoughtout gui Pixel explorer to speed script development less updating if any at all
[b]Disadvantages of I bot[/b] Not as efficent as a client edit in theory Scripts take more intelligence to produce Few scripts currently in existance
[img]http://www.impsoft.net/tp/Themes/blackandblue/images/5_mithpick.PNG[/img][b]Multimedia (Screenshots//Videos)[/b][img]http://www.impsoft.net/tp/Themes/blackandblue/images/5_mithpick.PNG[/img] NEW v2 Video, VERY GOOD!: http://rapidshare.de/files/36519075/ibot_v2.avi.html Video: http://www.uploadit.biz/download.php?filename=001948635.avi Pixel Explorer as shown in v1 here: http://img85.imageshack.us/img85/7073/ibot3fp7.png
[img]http://www.impsoft.net/tp/Themes/blackandblue/images/4_blakpick.PNG[/img][b]v2 Technical info[/b][img]http://www.impsoft.net/tp/Themes/blackandblue/images/4_blakpick.PNG[/img] [u]Changes[/u] pixel data stored in short[ x ][ y ][ 3 ], no longer int[ x ][ y ] The move from int to short arrays has boosted performance by 30% every core method changed and with the changing came many bugfixes and testing ALL OCR was re-written [b]toptext is now 98% correct (was 50%)[/b] getchat is now 100% correct (was 90%)
[u]New Things[/u] getCompass() getEnergy() setRun(boolean) isMapFlagUp() distanceMapToFlag() inventoryCount() itemExist(int) getStatTop(int) getStatBottom(int) getMenu() (returns a [b]MENU[/b] object containing all text of the menu and each rectange to click on for each slot :)!)
[img]http://www.impsoft.net/tp/Themes/blackandblue/images/3_stelpick.PNG[/img][b]FAQ![/b][img]http://www.impsoft.net/tp/Themes/blackandblue/images/3_stelpick.PNG[/img]
How to obtain I Bot? -----> Using SVN software checkout: http://OpenSVN.csie.org/IBot
How to use a SVN? -----> http://www.impsoft.net/tp/index.php?cat=1
WTF is a JRE or JDK? -----> http://www.impsoft.net/tp/index.php?page=12
How do i make a I Bot 'script'? -----> http://www.impsoft.net/tp/index.php?board=59.0
Got a error? can't get it to work right? can't even get it to load? FIRST read the posts @ http://www.impsoft.net/tp/index.php?board=13.0 or make a post @ http://www.impsoft.net/tp/index.php?board=47.0
[img]http://www.impsoft.net/tp/Themes/blackandblue/images/2_ironpick.PNG[/img][b]IMPSoft Server Info[/b][img]http://www.impsoft.net/tp/Themes/blackandblue/images/2_ironpick.PNG[/img]
Current SVN http://OpenSVN.csie.org/IBot Current IRC server irc.impsoft.net ip 64.72.114.249 port 6667 Current FORUM URL http://www.impsoft.net/ Current VENTRILLO server irc.impsoft.net ip 64.72.114.249 port 3784
[img]http://www.impsoft.net/tp/Themes/blackandblue/images/1_bronpick.PNG[/img][b]Recent IMPSoft News[/b][img]http://www.impsoft.net/tp/Themes/blackandblue/images/1_bronpick.PNG[/img]
[i]Thurs Oct 12th[/i] | I-Bot v2 Released
[i]Wed Sept 7th[/i] | RaW is ddosing us because we posted pics of his scammed money. He is now also attacking Sythe and Moparisthebest
[i]Sat Sept 23rd[/i] | Record impsoft.net traffic,, 646 unique ip's 12024 pageviews who have java-script enabled browzers
[img]http://www.impsoft.net/tp/Themes/blackandblue/images/smflogo.gif[/img] [u]www.impsoft.net[/u]
[img]http://www.impsoft.net/tp/Themes/blackandblue/images/9_legendpick.PNG[/img][b]Tracroute (Other forum simul posts)[/b][img]http://www.impsoft.net/tp/Themes/blackandblue/images/9_legendpick.PNG[/img]
Cruels.net -Down- Rei-net http://reinet.co.uk/viewtopic.php?pid=1266569#p1266569 Moparisthebest http://www.moparisthebest.org:80/smf/index.php/topic,27068.0.html Jaghax -server busy- Dingo http://dingo-forums.com/viewtopic.php?p=9235&sid=ccfc8ceeae52f2d077854d1759bd3d73#9235 Sythe http://www.sythe.org/showthread.php?p=1330534#post1330534 RS-R http://www.rs-resources.com/mxvfg/viewtopic.php?f=73&t=329 NextG3n http://www.nextg3n.com/showthread.php?p=371#post371 Scar Scripts forum http://forum.scar-scripts.com/showthread.php?p=2537#post2537 rs2limited http://rs2limited.net/forum/viewtopic.php?p=6935&sid=6008bd29ac6bbaf2cadba95220fffa55#6935 rs2cheatz.net http://rs2cheatz.net/forum/viewtopic.php?p=1728&sid=93234652106582aaf5ef82cbb464cc43#1728 fagex -sever busy- GamerzPlanet.net -down- [/center]

item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“ruler, post:29, topic:18108”][quote author=Taios link=topic=27068.msg315134#msg315134 date=1160836256]
I think the correct term Geno, is only public working rs2 bot ;).
[/quote]
We caught up to you!
Killing chicken: http://rapidshare.de/files/36519075/ibot_v2.avi.html (lol)

But remember we are both behind Bender in dev time

Those sausi hackers are selling arga on ebay:
http://cgi.ebay.com/Arga-Expanded-Scale-Voltmeters-Flyer-100-101_W0QQitemZ7560907814QQihZ017QQcategoryZ25409QQrdZ1QQssPageNameZWD1VQQcmdZViewItem[/quote][quote=“ruler, post:29, topic:18108”][quote author=Taios link=topic=27068.msg315134#msg315134 date=1160836256]
I think the correct term Geno, is only public working rs2 bot ;).
[/quote]
We caught up to you!
Killing chicken: http://rapidshare.de/files/36519075/ibot_v2.avi.html (lol)

But remember we are both behind Bender in dev time

Those sausi hackers are selling arga on ebay:
http://cgi.ebay.com/Arga-Expanded-Scale-Voltmeters-Flyer-100-101_W0QQitemZ7560907814QQihZ017QQcategoryZ25409QQrdZ1QQssPageNameZWD1VQQcmdZViewItem[/quote]

Hey, i wasnt saying what you have done wasnt good ;). Just saying, its not the only working rs2 bot, and i am not just talking about ARGA. :).

O man, how did they get my arga sauce?

(sorry if i sound like a noob :P)[br][size=1]Posted at: October 15, 2006, 12:05:03 AM[/size][hr]Ooo I think I got it ^_^[br][size=1]Posted at: October 15, 2006, 12:07:59 AM[/size][hr]w00t, i did… its loading the game… now I can probably learn how to do some stuff and run a few scripts :D[br][size=1]Posted at: October 15, 2006, 12:08:45 AM[/size][hr]YAY Its working im gunna see if i can find some already made scripts and test them out

item.title: I Bot v2 by IMPSoft . net Released! [The ONLY WORKING RS2 Bot]
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

GenoDemoN:

Martin – to our knowledege it doesnt trigger any java traps as we dont touch the java client AT ALL. although there are the standard mouse viewing and un-human things that are assciated with running poorly made scripts etc. Basically you have less of a chance to get banned than any other bot, even scar as the mouse function has been improved dramatically but i cannot say 100% yet. i cannot judge untill its massivly used ya know.

Okay thanks, I new you hadn’t touched the Runescape classes. I was thinking more about that Browser trap. you know the one?

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: I Bot v2 by IMPSoft . net Released! [The ONLY WORKING RS2 Bot]
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

rictoon when you find the font let me know, check the unused folder.

load it with FontManager.loadFont(String name, boolean checkAll,
boolean checkoutlineTop, boolean checkoutlineBottom, boolean cap,
boolean cap2, int outlinespaceX, int outlinespaceY

And use
ocrGetTextAt(int x, int maxX, int y,
int maxPixlesWithOutMatch, String font, boolean maskCanBeBlack,
RGB color, int maskTolerance, int tolerance)

Dont be scard of these functions, i know they will be difficult to for most. I will try to help when the transition from v1 to v2 is done.

Read full topic
